author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/the-eternal-life-of-goldman/

Please welcome Kevin Penkin (Star Wars: Vision, Made in Abyss, Florence), Mason Lieberman (Overwatch 2, Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical, League of Legends: Wild Rift), Pete Lepley (Wargroove, Sky Rogue), and Yasunori Nishiki (Octopath Traveler, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) to the mixdown.

While Nishiki's compositions are yet to grace the world of The Eternal Life of Goldman, we'll immerse him in the vibrant soundscapes of Penkin, Lieberman, and Lepley, showcasing each of their creative approaches and fairy-dusting it with fresh gameplay.

With this collaborative exchange, a symphony of passion, we are sure to ignite Nishiki's creative fire.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: The Eternal Life of Goldman - Composers Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/indiana-jones-and-the-great-circle/

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™ is set to launch on PlayStation 5 on April 17. Play up to 2 days early with the Premium Edition.  

The game showcases a suite of immersive-enhancing features that leverage the console's capabilities, making for an epic adventure.  

#ps5 #ps5games #indianajonesandthegreatcircle
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - Features Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Buy now at https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/mlb-the-show/
Learn more at https://mlbthe.show/OdCq

The first-ever Weekend Classic* is live today at 12 PM PT in MLB The Show 25!

Weekend Classic runs for 4 days from April 11–15 and is a solo-ranked mode. Your first 6 games are key, with big-time rewards and 100-player leaderboards built for each league.

Climb the leaderboard, rack up wins, and earn huge rewards, including Corey Kluber, making his return as one of the most feared arms in the game.

Play. Win. Climb. The competition starts now.

#ps5 #ps5games #MLBTheShow

*Internet connection and console-specific online multiplayer subscription required.
title: MLB The Show 25 - Weekend Classic Arrives! | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/indiana-jones-and-the-great-circle/

The adventure begins on April 17. Play up to 2 days early with the Premium Edition.  

Awarded D.I.C.E “Adventure Game of the Year” and featured in over 50 "Best of" and "Game of the Year" lists in 2024, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle delivers an immersive experience that allows you to step into the boots of the renowned archaeologist.  

#ps5 #ps5games #indianajonesandthegreatcircle
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/vigor/

Brace for calamity in Vigor Meltdown! As radiation spreads, only the strongest and best-prepared will prevail.

This Season’s Battle Pass is packed with essential survival gear, including hazmat suits and gas masks, to help you endure the deadly fallout. Adapt to every challenge with new Custom Loadouts through the reworked Wardrobe. You'll also find Action Figures scattered across the Outlands, keep your eyes peeled for this latest collection of mementos!

The stakes have been raised, but are you ready for the meltdown?

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Vigor Meltdown - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Wishlist DIG VR Now: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009182

DIG VR captures the sheer joy, adrenaline and frustrations of life on a digger in an exciting experience for novices and pros. Featuring authentic, immersive controls that recreate the feeling of driving a real digger, DIG VR is a light-simulation game with a casual arcade-twist!

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games
title: Dig VR - Gameplay Trailer | PS VR2 Games
